ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] serverfilter
ygData.msgSnippet: If you turn off server-filter you will lag more. The serverfilter makes the game remove the texts you have chosen not to see on the server side. If you remove
ygData.messageBody:
If you turn off server-filter you will lag more. The serverfilter makes the
game remove the texts you have chosen not to see on the server side. If you
remove this all text will still be sent to you (such as other hits etc.) but
your client will not show them to you. If you turn the serverfilter on the
server wont even send these texts to your client.

-domi

-----Original Message-----
From: mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Sent: den 14 januari 2003 17:44
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] serverfilter


For lag reduction in Luclin my son has disabled numerous components
of the game. One I don't of them I don't recognize is serverfilter.
Any idea what serverfilter does? What turning it off does?

For the most part we re-tune the game depending on where we are
playing. Most of the changes are easy to make and correct with the
new interface. On the whole, the game still runs well.

Barto
